title: Weaver's Thesis Book, ca. 1860
medium: Medium: paper bound with buckram covered cardboard with suede back and corners, containing samples and mises-en-carte.
dimensions: H: 4 x W: 29 x L: 44.3 cm
creditline: Museum purchase from Trustees' Book Appropriation
description: Uncompleted book written in delicate longhand labelled on title page; "Theorie des Etoffes Unies et Faconnees".  Contains 131 samples of fabrics, 99 mises-encarte, numerous sketches for heddle arrangements, technical drawings and descriptions of fabrics.

tombstone.epitaph: Weaver's Thesis Book, ca. 1860.Medium: paper bound with buckram covered cardboard with suede back and corners, containing samples and mises-en-carte.. Museum purchase from Trustees' Book Appropriation. 1939-40-4.
